item.title: Conference Notes — Language and AI: Generating Interdisciplinary Connections and Possibilities at Berkeley
item.description: Notes from the conference hosted by the Berkeley Language Center and the Townsend Center’s Language and AI working group exploring interdisciplinary connections between language, culture, and AI.
